about_the_game:
After a string of personal setbacks, Steven returns to Lightford, a normal boring 90s town surrounded by forests in the pacific northwest. But something dark stirs beneath the surface—rumors of strange phenomena, secret experiments and a mysterious company pull Steven into an eerie journey that tests both his wits and courage. Every choice you make will shape your fate and the story that unfolds and how the environment of Lightford changes.

🕵️ Stealth and Sandbox Combat – Choose Your Approach

  • Navigate Lightford’s dangers with the tools you discover.

  • Use gadgets like tasers, teleportation devices, grappling hooks, and more to outsmart foes, avoid detection, or engage with enemies as you see fit.

  • How you handle each encounter—from slipping through shadows to taking a bold stand or talking your way out of situations—shapes how you progress through Lightford’s mysteries.

🔍 Investigate and Uncover – Piece Together Lightford’s Secrets

  • Delve into Lightford’s hidden world. Capture photos, track suspicious figures, and gather evidence wherever you find it.

  • Follow leads, photograph oddities, and organize clues on your detective board to connect dots that reveal the town’s dark history and supernatural entanglements.

  • With each clue, you’re drawn closer to the truth—but be warned, some secrets are buried for a reason.

🌌 Timeline Puzzle Solving – Cross Timelines to Solve Mysteries

  • Discover a shard to another Timeline, each holding unique puzzles, hidden paths, and otherworldly dangers and your actions on one affect the other for the better or worse.

  • Use your gadget toolkit to bypass obstacles and solve environmental challenges across dimensions.

  • Every time holds different clues, and only by crossing between them can you uncover the full story of Lightford’s shadowy past.

🚶 Exploration and Discovery – A Town Full of Secrets

  • Lightford is alive with secrets, from secluded forest paths to derelict buildings hiding evidence of twisted experiments and the mysteries of the town itself.

  • Roam freely on foot or by truck through dense woods, eerie lakes, and the town as you uncover strange phenomena that defy explanation.

  • Keep your eyes open—Lightford’s landscapes and skies hold surprises that might lead you to answers…or new questions.

🌍 A Living Ecosystem and Intelligent AI

  • Lightford’s residents and creatures interact with each other and react to your choices, making the town feel truly alive.

  • Mysterious creatures and townsfolk alike have their own motives and routines, bringing a dynamic, ever-shifting world to life.

  • As you dig deeper, the lines between friend and foe blur, and every encounter could be key to unraveling Lightford’s secrets.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game features some mature content, primarily centered around key narrative elements. This may involve some depictions of violence or mature language integral to the progression of the story. We take great care in handling these elements with sensitivity and respect. If you seek more details regarding specific content, feel free to reach out.
